mapper.sql: id, resource_no, resourc_type, operator,usedepartment_type,workplace_id, network_room_id, department_id, usedepartment_id, username, equipment_id, equipment_port_num, expense_id, account_center, create_time, creator_id
mapper.insert: insert into t_resource ( id, resource_no, resourc_type, operator,usedepartment_type, workplace_id, network_room_id, department_id, usedepartment_id, username, equipment_id, equipment_port_num, expense_id, account_center, create_time, creator_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{resource_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourc_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{usedepartment_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{workplace_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{network_room_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{department_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{usedepartment_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipment_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{equipment_port_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expense_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{account_center,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator_id,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update t_resource
resource_no = #{resource_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resourc_type = #{resourc_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usedepartment_type = #{usedepartment_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workplace_id = #{workplace_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
network_room_id = #{network_room_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
department_id = #{department_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
usedepartment_id = #{usedepartment_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_id = #{equipment_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
equipment_port_num = #{equipment_port_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expense_id = #{expense_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
account_center = #{account_center,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator_id = #{creator_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_resource set resource_no = #{resource_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resourc_type = #{resourc_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usedepartment_type = #{usedepartment_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workplace_id = #{workplace_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, network_room_id = #{network_room_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, department_id = #{department_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, usedepartment_id = #{usedepartment_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equipment_id = #{equipment_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, equipment_port_num = #{equipment_port_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expense_id = #{expense_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, account_center = #{account_center,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_id = #{creator_id,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) from t_resource WHERE resource_no = #{resource_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t2.equipment_sn equipment_sn,t2.equipment_type equipment_type, t1.equipment_port_num equipment_port_num, t1.equipment_id equipment_id FROM t_resource t1 LEFT JOIN t_equipment t2 ON t1.equipment_id = t2.id WHERE t1.id = #{id}

SELECT t1.id id, t1.resource_no resource_no,t1.resourc_type resourc_type, t1.operator operator, t2.workplace_name workplace_name,t3.department_name department_name, t4.department_name usedepartment_name, t1.username username FROM t_resource t1 LEFT JOIN t_workplace t2 ON t1.workplace_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_department t3 ON t1.department_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN t_department t4 ON t1.usedepartment_id = t4.id
resource_no like concat("%",#{queryText},"%")

select count(*) from t_resource
resource_no like concat("%",#{queryText},"%")

SELECT t1.id id, t1.resource_no resource_no,t1.resourc_type resourc_type, t1.operator operator, t2.workplace_name workplace_name,t3.department_name department_name, t4.department_name usedepartment_name, t1.username username FROM t_resource t1 LEFT JOIN t_workplace t2 ON t1.workplace_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_department t3 ON t1.department_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN t_department t4 ON t1.usedepartment_id = t4.id WHERE t1.id = #{resource_id}
